metadata.description: Use Azure AD Groups for RBAC

variables.commonResourceGroup: [if(not(equals(parameters('commonResourceGroup_param'), '')), parameters('commonResourceGroup_param'), format('{0}esml-common-{1}-{2}{3}', parameters('commonRGNamePrefix'), parameters('locationSuffix'), parameters('env'), parameters('aifactorySuffixRG')))]
variables.vnetNameFull: [if(not(equals(parameters('vnetNameFull_param'), '')), replace(parameters('vnetNameFull_param'), '<network_env>', parameters('network_env')), format('{0}-{1}-{2}{3}', parameters('vnetNameBase'), parameters('locationSuffix'), parameters('env'), parameters('commonResourceSuffix')))]
variables.miACAName: [format('mi-aca-{0}-{1}-{2}-{3}{4}{5}', variables('projectName'), parameters('locationSuffix'), parameters('env'), variables('uniqueInAIFenv'), variables('randomSalt'), parameters('resourceSuffix'))]
variables.miPrjName: [format('mi-{0}-{1}-{2}-{3}{4}{5}', variables('projectName'), parameters('locationSuffix'), parameters('env'), variables('uniqueInAIFenv'), variables('randomSalt'), parameters('resourceSuffix'))]

resources.name: [parameters('privateLinksDnsZones')[copyIndex()].name]
resources.location: [if(and(equals(parameters('privateLinksDnsZones')[copyIndex()].name, format('{0}.data.privatelink.azurecr.io', parameters('location'))), equals(parameters('allGlobal'), false())), parameters('location'), variables('locationGlobal'))]

resources.name: [format('{0}/{1}', parameters('privateLinksDnsZones')[copyIndex()].name, uniqueString(parameters('privateLinksDnsZones')[copyIndex()].name))]
resources.location: [if(and(equals(parameters('privateLinksDnsZones')[copyIndex()].name, format('{0}.data.privatelink.azurecr.io', parameters('location'))), equals(parameters('allGlobal'), false())), parameters('location'), variables('locationGlobal'))]

metadata.description: AIFACTORY-UPDATE-121: Create Private DNS Zones if not centralized
Creates a user assigned MI, needed to be created before ACA, and needs to be assigned ACR Pull permissions to access an Azure Container Registry, before ACA
Creates a user assigned MI, needed to be created before ACA, and needs to be assigned ACR Pull permissions to access an Azure Container Registry, before ACA

properties.scriptContent:
Write-Host "DEBUG OUTPUT VARIABLES:"
      Write-Host "vnetId: $env:DEBUG_VNET_ID"
      Write-Host "projectName: $env:PROJECT_NAME"
      Write-Host "projectNumber: $env:PROJECT_NUMBER"
      Write-Host "env: $env:ENV_NAME"
      Write-Host "location: $env:LOCATION"
      Write-Host "locationSuffix: $env:LOCATION_SUFFIX"
      Write-Host "commonResourceGroup: $env:COMMON_RG"
      Write-Host "targetResourceGroup: $env:TARGET_RG"
      Write-Host "vnetNameFull: $env:VNET_NAME_FULL"
      Write-Host "vnetResourceGroupName: $env:VNET_RG_NAME"
      Write-Host "common_subnet_name_local: $env:COMMON_SUBNET_NAME"
      Write-Host "genaiSubnetId: $env:GENAI_SUBNET_ID"
      Write-Host "genaiSubnetName: $env:GENAI_SUBNET_NAME"
      Write-Host "defaultSubnet: $env:DEFAULT_SUBNET"
      Write-Host "aksSubnetId: $env:AKS_SUBNET_ID"
      Write-Host "aksSubnetName: $env:AKS_SUBNET_NAME"
      Write-Host "subscriptionId: $env:SUBSCRIPTION_ID"
      Write-Host "vnetRule1: $env:VNET_RULE_1"
      Write-Host "vnetRule2: $env:VNET_RULE_2"
      Write-Host "postGreSQLExists: $env:postGreSQLExists"
      Write-Host "debug_keyvaultExists: $env:keyvaultExists"
      Write-Host "debug_aiSearchExists: $env:aiSearchExists"

metadata.description: Specifies the objectId of the person that ordered the resources
Specifies the email address of the person that ordered the resources
Additional optional Object ID of more people to access the Vm vmAdminLoginRole
Additional optional email address of more people to access the Vm vmAdminLoginRole

properties.description: [format('Contributor to user {0} to get VMAdminLogin', parameters('additionalUserIds')[range(0, length(parameters('additionalUserIds')))[copyIndex()]])]
[format('Contributor to user {0} to get VMAdminLogin', variables('main_email_2_array')[range(0, length(variables('main_principal_2_array')))[copyIndex()]])]
